feed.title: New BIP32 structure for P2SH multisig wallets [BIP-45]

entry.title: New BIP32 structure for P2SH multisig wallets [BIP-45]
entry.summary: On 04/10/15 18:24, Thomas Kerin wrote an email suggesting the amendment of BIP45. However, he was informed that BIP's are not amended after the fact, and it may be best to write a new BIP specifying a "pseudorandom & deterministic path generation for HD/multi-signature accounts". The email was accompanied by a non-text attachment, a digital signature in OpenPGP format.
